message: Starting comprehensive security testing and vulnerability assessment of ALD control system
Analyzed existing security test infrastructure - comprehensive frameworks found for credential, database, and PLC security testing
SQL injection tests PASSED - database layer properly secured with parameterized queries and UUID validation. Database rejects all injection attempts with proper error handling.

Race condition security testing complete - found 11 unsafe async patterns that need protection via locks or atomic operations. Transactional system is implemented but integration status needs verification.
SECURITY TESTING MISSION ACCOMPLISHED: Comprehensive security validation complete with 88.8% security score, 4/5 tests passed, comprehensive vulnerability assessment and executive report delivered
